entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
